function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of cloud-based ai-assisted ct service for detecting covid-19 pneumonia","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global availability of open-source deep convolutional neural network design for detecting covid-19 cases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and isolation measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of digital technology for quarantine and self-isolation monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns with the collection and storage of personal health data through mobile applications.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of missed exposure and contact tracing due to the absence of mobile phones or mobile service.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low adoption rates of contact tracing applications leading to reduced effectiveness of the mitigation strategy.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of widespread testing and screening technologies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of digital systems for screening vital signs and self-reporting of symptoms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ai predictive models trained on chinese samples may not be generalizable to other populations.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate screening and testing strategies in some countries may result in underreporting of covid-19 cases and transmission rates.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of big data and ai for tracking people and infection spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of mobile phones and social media for real-time data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Real-time data reporting and sharing within healthcare organizations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective pandemic management despite preparedness","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater treatment plant wwtp inflow","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unspecific signal in rt-qpcr testing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
